::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
1.  **It's warming**
2.  It's us
3.  We're sure
4.  It's bad
5.  We can fix it

## Five stages of climate denial

- Stage 1: Deny the Problem Exists
- Stage 2: Deny We're the Cause 
  - Stage 2b: Consensus Denial 
- Stage 3: Deny It's a Problem  
- Stage 4: Deny We can Solve It  
- Stage 5: It's too Late  

::: footer
Source: Dana Nuccitelli, The Guardian, [The 5 stages of climate denial are on display ahead of the IPCC report](https://www.theguardian.com/environment/climate-consensus-97-per-cent/2013/sep/16/climate-change-contrarians-5-stages-denial)
:::


## Climate and Weather

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
> Climate is the average weather conditions of a region over a long period of time, usually at least 30 years. Weather refers to short-term atmospheric conditions. Climate change refers to long-term changes.
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
> Weather refers to short-term atmospheric conditions. Climate change refers to long-term changes.
:::
:::

::: footer
Source: [National Geographic](https://education.nationalgeographic.org/resource/all-about-climate/)
:::

## Greenhouse Gases(GHG){.smaller}


| GHG                           | GWP-100   | Lifetime (Years) |
|-------------------------------|-----------|------------------|
| Carbon Dioxide (CO2)          | 1         | hundreds         |
| Methane (CH4)                 | 29.8±11   | 11.8 ± 1.8       |
| Nitrous Oxide (N2O)           | 273 ± 130 | 109 ± 10         |
| Hydrofluorocarbon-32 (HFC-32) | 771 ± 292 | 5.4 ± 1.1        |

:::{style="text-align: center;"}
Other GHG:  

- Sulphur hexafluoride (SF6) 
- PFC-14 (CF4) 
- Water vapour 
:::

::: footer
Source: [Table 7.15](https://report.ipcc.ch/ar6/wg1/IPCC_AR6_WGI_FullReport.pdf) in the IPCC AR6 WG-I Report.
:::

## Social cost of carbon{.smaller}

- Marginal cost of carbon\
- Cost included:\
  - Net agricultural productivity\
  - Human health\
  - Property damage\
  - Energy system costs\
- Cost not included:\
  - Unknown impact: physical, ecological, economic\
  - Unknown cost: information\
